title: Corporate Lifestyle Simulator v1.104-ALiAS
description:
Corporate Lifestyle Simulator v1.104                
                              (c) Dolphin Barn
                                                                             
          Release date: 18/04/2014          Protection:Money
          Files: 23x10.00MB                 Language: English                   


                                   RELEASE
                                   NOTES
 
  
     Here are all of the changes in this latest update (v1.104):               
                                                                               
     - Screen resolution fails back to defaults more gracefully if there       
       was an issue setting a new    resolution. (Have not been able to        
       replicate image loading bug.)                                           
     - Button background colour changed                                        
     - Tough Talk and Buzzwords should be less often and better randomized     
     - Added volume slider for Tough Talk                                      
     - Added volume slider for Zombie Buzzwords                                
     - Added volume slider for Cut Scenes                                      
     - Streaming rather than pre-load Zombie Buzzwords for faster loading.     
                                                                               
     _____________________________________________________________________     
                                                                               
     An isometric orgy of bloody violence and huge chiptunes.                  
                                                                               
     Battle your way through 27 levels of corporate architecture full of       
     brain dead, corporate, buzzword-spewing, project managers using           
     office furniture as your primary weapons.                                 
                                                                               
     Fight back against the forces of tyranny and liberate your fellow         
     coworkers from the oppressive evil that dominates them, in a series       
     of challenges deep inside the bowels of a massive evil corporation:       
     SuperCorp.                                                                
                                                                               
     Smash ALL THE THINGS.                                                     
                                                                               
     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                                                     
                                                                               
     1. Unzip & Unrar                                                          
     2. Run Setup.exe for install                                              
     3, Have Fun!!!!                                                           
                                                                               
     Ripped: Nothing                                                           
  
                                   NOTES

 
      1. Don't forget to add an exception to your antivirus (if required)
      2. Block all game executables in your firewall
